body: I thought this was going to be good ever since I saw this on Melonbooks (but unfortunately It already ran out of copy when I was about to buy it. So I have to rely here.) But, it was actually more than what I expected. It turns out that: for me, this is the best doujinshi of Minami☆, probably even the best doujin I've seen. I like the plot, especially the somewhat comical ending.
